change.item: I made the speakers lower case; added hyphens to broken words in choral passages; took out "L N="0006" L N="014"" at line 874.

$Log: eur.hel_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2009-11-23 18:46:35 rsingh04 moved more xml files around based on copyright status

Revision 1.4 2000/01/11 20:40:40 amahoney convert to P3

te/ras ga\r o( bi/os kai\ ta\ pra/gmat' e)sti/ mou,
ta\ me\n di' *(/hran, ta\ de\ to\ ka/llos ai)/tion.
ei)/q' e)caleifqei=s' w(s a)/galm' au)=qis pa/lin
ai)/sxion ei)=dos e)/labon a)nti\ tou= kalou=,
kai\ ta\s tu/xas me\n ta\s kaka\s a(\s nu=n e)/xw
*(/ellhnes e)pela/qonto, ta\s de\ mh\ kaka\s
e)/sw|zon w(/sper ta\s kaka\s sw/|zousi/ mou.
o(/stis me\n ou)=n e)s mi/an a)poble/pwn tu/xhn
pro\s qew=n kakou=tai, baru\ me/n, oi)ste/on d' o(/mws:
h(mei=s de\ pollai=s sumforai=s e)gkei/meqa.
prw=ton me\n ou)k ou)=s' a)/dikos, ei)mi\ duskleh/s:
kai\ tou=to mei=zon th=s a)lhqei/as kako/n,
o(/stis ta\ mh\ proso/nta ke/kthtai kaka/.
e)/peita patri/dos qeoi/ m' a)fidru/santo gh=s
e)s ba/rbar' h)/qh, kai\ fi/lwn thtwme/nh
dou/lh kaqe/sthk' ou)=s' e)leuqe/rwn a)/po:
ta\ barba/rwn ga\r dou=la pa/nta plh\n e(no/s.
a)/gkura d' h(/ mou ta\s tu/xas w)/xei mo/nh,
po/sin poq' h(/cein kai/ m' a)palla/cein kakw=n —
ou(=tos te/qnhken, ou(=tos ou)ke/t' e)/sti dh/.
mh/thr d' o)/lwle, kai\ foneu\s au)th=s e)gw/,
a)di/kws me/n, a)lla\ ta)/dikon tou=t' e)/st' e)mo/n:
o(\ d' a)gla/isma dwma/twn e)mou= t' e)/fu,
quga/thr a)/nandros polia\ parqeneu/etai:
tw\ tou= *dio\s de\ legome/nw *diosko/rw
ou)k e)sto/n. a)lla\ pa/nt' e)/xousa dustuxh=
toi=s pra/gmasin te/qnhka, toi=s d' e)/rgoisin ou)/.
to\ d' e)/sxaton tou=t', ei) mo/loimen e)s pa/tran,
klh/|qrois a)\n ei)rgoi/mesqa — th\n u(p' *)ili/w|
dokou=ntes *(ele/nhn *mene/lew/ m' e)lqei=n me/ta.
ei) me\n ga\r e)/zh po/sis, a)negnw/sqhmen a)\n
e)lqo/ntes, a(\ fane/r' h)=n mo/nois, e)s cu/mbola.
nu=n d' ou)/te tou=t' e)/st' ou)/te mh\ swqh=| pote.
ti/ dh=t' e)/ti zw=; ti/n' u(polei/pomai tu/xhn;
ga/mous e(lome/nh tw=n kakw=n u(pallaga/s,
met' a)ndro\s oi)kei=n barba/rou pro\s plousi/an
tra/pezan i(/zous'; a)ll' o(/tan po/sis pikro\s
cunh=| gunaiki/, kai\ to\ sw=m' e)stin pikro/n.
qanei=n kra/tiston: pw=s qa/noim' a)\n ou) kalw=s;
[a)sxh/mones me\n a)gxo/nai meta/rsioi,
ka)n toi=si dou/lois dusprepe\s nomi/zetai:
sfagai\ d' e)/xousin eu)gene/s ti kai\ kalo/n,
smikro\n d' o( kairo\s sa/rk' a)palla/cai bi/ou.]
e)s ga\r tosou=ton h)/lqomen ba/qos kakw=n:
ai( me\n ga\r a)/llai dia\ to\ ka/llos eu)tuxei=s
gunai=kes, h(ma=s d' au)to\ tou=t' a)pw/lesen.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: *(ele/nh, to\n e)lqo/nq', o(/stis e)sti\n o( ce/nos,
mh\ pa/nt' a)lhqh= doca/sh|s ei)rhke/nai.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: kai\ mh\n safw=s g' e)/lec' o)lwle/nai po/sin.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: po/ll' a)\n ge/noito kai\ dia\ yeudw=n e)/ph.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: kai\ ta)/mpali/n ge tw=nd' a)lhqei/a| safh=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)s cumfora\n ga\r a)nti\ ta)gaqou= fe/rh|.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: fo/bos ga\r e)s to\ dei=ma peribalw/n m' a)/gei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pw=s d' eu)menei/as toisi/d' e)n do/mois e)/xeis;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: pa/ntes fi/loi moi plh\n o( qhreu/wn ga/mous.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: oi)=sq' ou)=n o(\ dra=son; mnh/matos lipou=s' e(/dran —

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: e)s poi=on e(/rpeis mu=qon h)\ parai/nesin;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)lqou=s' e)s oi)/kous, h(\ ta\ pa/nt' e)pi/statai,
th=s ponti/as *nhrh=|dos e)kgo/nou ko/rhs,
puqou= po/sin so\n *qeono/hs, ei)/t' e)/st' e)/ti
ei)/t' e)kle/loipe fe/ggos: e)kmaqou=sa d' eu)=
pro\s ta\s tu/xas to\ xa/rma tou\s go/ous t' e)/xe.
pri\n d' ou)de\n o)rqw=s ei)de/nai, ti/ soi ple/on
lupoume/nh| ge/noit' a)/n; a)ll' e)moi\ piqou=:
ta/fon lipou=sa to/nde su/mmeicon ko/rh|:
o(/qenper ei)/sh| pa/nta ta)lhqh= maqei=n
e)/xous' e)n oi)/kois toi=sde, ti/ ble/peis pro/sw;
qe/lw de\ ka)gw\ soi\ suneiselqei=n do/mous
kai\ sumpuqe/sqai parqe/nou qespi/smata:
gunai=ka ga\r dh\ sumponei=n gunaiki\ xrh/.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: fi/lai, lo/gous e)deca/man:
ba=te ba=te d' e)s do/mous,
a)gw=nas e)nto\s oi)/kwn
w(s pu/qhsqe tou\s e)mou/s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: qe/lousan ou) mo/lis kalei=s.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: i)w\ me/leos a(me/ra.
ti/n' a)/ra ta/laina ti/na dakruo/-
enta lo/gon a)kou/somai;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mh\ pro/mantis a)lge/wn
prola/mban', w)= fi/la, go/ous.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ti/ moi po/sis me/leos e)/tla;
po/tera de/rketai fa/os
te/qrippa/ q' a(li/ou ke/leuqa/ t' a)ste/rwn,
h)\ 'n ne/kusi kata\ xqono\s
ta\n xro/nion e)/xei tu/xan;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)s to\ fe/rteron ti/qei
to\ me/llon, o(/ ti genh/setai.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: se\ ga\r e)ka/lesa, se\ de\ kato/mosa,
to\n u(dro/enti do/naki xlwro\n
*eu)rw/tan, qano/ntos
ei) ba/cis e)/tumos a)ndro\s
a(/de moi — ti/ ta/d' a)su/neta; —
fo/nion ai)w/rhma
dia\ de/rhs o)re/comai,
h)\ cifokto/non di/wgma
laimorru/tou sfaga=s
au)tosi/daron e)/sw pela/sw dia\ sarko\s a(/millan,
qu=ma trizu/gois qeai=si
tw=| te sh/raggas *)idai/
as e)ni/zonti *priami/
da| pot' a)mfi\ bousta/qmous.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/llos' a)potropa\ kakw=n
ge/noito, to\ de\ so\n eu)tuxe/s.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: i)w\ *troi/a ta/laina,
di' e)/rg' a)/nerg' o)/llusai
me/lea/ t' e)/tlas: ta\ d' e)ma\ dw=ra
*ku/pridos e)/teke polu\ me\n ai(=ma,
polu\ de\ da/kruon: a)/xea/ t' a)/xesi,
da/krua da/krusin e)/labe, pa/qea. . . .
mate/res te pai=das o)/lesan,
a)po\ de\ parqe/noi ko/mas
e)/qento su/ggonoi nekrw=n *skama/ndrion
a)mfi\ *fru/gion oi)=dma.
boa\n boa\n d' *(ella\s
kela/dhse ka)noto/tucen,
e)pi\ de\ krati\ xe/ras e)/qhken,
o)/nuxi d' a(palo/xroa ge/nun
deu=se foni/aisi plagai=s.
w)= ma/kar *)arkadi/a| pote\ parqe/ne *kallistoi=, *dio\s
a(\ lexe/wn e)pe/bas tetraba/mosi gui/ois,
w(s polu\ matro\s e)ma=s e)/laxes ple/on,
a( morfa=| qhrw=n laxnogui/wn —
o)/mmati la/brw=| sxh=ma leai/nhs —
e)calla/cas' a)/xqea lu/phs:
a(/n te/ pot' *)/artemis e)cexoreu/sato
xrusoke/rat' e)/lafon *me/ropos *titani/da kou/ran
kallosu/nas e(/neken: to\ d' e)mo\n de/mas
w)/lesen w)/lese pe/rgama *dardani/as
o)lome/nous t' *)axaiou/s.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: w)= ta\s teqri/ppous *oi)noma/w| *pi=san ka/ta
*pe/loy a(mi/llas e)camillhqei/s pote,
ei)/q' w)/feles to/q', h(ni/k' e)/ranon ei)s qeou\s
peisqei\s e)poi/eis, e)n qeoi=s lipei=n bi/on,

pri
 to
 e)mo
 *)atre/a pate/ra gennh=sai/ pote,
o(\s e)ce/fusen *)aero/phs le/ktrwn a)/po
*)agame/mnon' e)me/ te *mene/lewn, kleino\n zugo/n:
plei=ston ga\r oi)=mai — kai\ to/d' ou) ko/mpw| le/gw —
stra/teuma kw/ph| diori/sai *troi/an e)/pi,
tu/rannos ou)de\n pro\s bi/an strathlatw=n,
e(kou=si d' a)/rcas *(ella/dos neani/ais.
kai\ tou\s me\n ou)ke/t' o)/ntas a)riqmh=sai pa/ra,
tou\s d' e)k qala/sshs a)sme/nous pefeugo/tas,
nekrw=n fe/rontas o)no/mat' ei)s oi)/kous pa/lin.
e)gw\ d' e)p' oi)=dma po/ntion glaukh=s a(lo\s
tlh/mwn a)lw=mai xro/non o(/sonper *)ili/ou
pu/rgous e)/persa, ka)s pa/tran xrh/|zwn molei=n
ou)k a)ciou=mai tou=de pro\s qew=n tuxei=n.
*libu/hs t' e)rh/mous a)ce/nous t' e)pidroma\s
pe/pleuka pa/sas: xw(/tan e)ggu\s w)= pa/tras,
pa/lin m' a)pwqei= pneu=ma, kou)/pot' ou)/rion
e)sh=lqe lai=fos w(/ste m' e)s pa/tran molei=n.
kai\ nu=n ta/las nauago\s a)pole/sas fi/lous
e)ce/peson e)s gh=n th/nde: nau=s de\ pro\s pe/tras
pollou\s a)riqmou\s a)/gnutai nauagi/wn.
tro/pis d' e)lei/fqh poiki/lwn a(rmosma/twn,
e)f' h(=s e)sw/qhn mo/lis a)nelpi/stw| tu/xh|
*(ele/nh te, *troi/as h(\n a)pospa/sas e)/xw.
o)/noma de\ xw/ras h(/tis h(/de kai\ lew\s
ou)k oi)=da: o)/xlon ga\r e)spesei=n h)|sxuno/mhn
w(/sq' i(storh=sai, ta\s e)ma\s dusxlaini/as
kru/ptwn u(p' ai)dou=s th=s tu/xhs. o(/tan d' a)nh\r
pra/ch| kakw=s u(yhlo/s, ei)s a)hqi/an
pi/ptei kaki/w tou= pa/lai dusdai/monos.
xrei/a de\ tei/rei m': ou)/te ga\r si=tos pa/ra
ou)/t' a)mfi\ xrw=t' e)sqh=tes: au)ta\ d' ei)ka/sai
pa/resti nao\s e)kbo/lois a(\ a)mpi/sxomai.
pe/plous de\ tou\s pri\n lampra/ t' a)mfiblh/mata
xlida/s te po/ntos h(/rpas': e)n d' a)/ntrou muxoi=s
kru/yas gunai=ka th\n kakw=n pa/ntwn e)moi\
a)/rcasan h(/kw tou/s te perileleimme/nous
fi/lwn fula/ssein ta)/m' a)nagka/sas le/xh.
mo/nos de\ nostw=, toi=s e)kei= zhtw=n fi/lois
ta\ pro/sfor' h)/n pws e)cereunh/sas la/bw.
i)dw\n de\ dw=ma perifere\s qrigkoi=s to/de
pu/las te semna\s a)ndro\s o)lbi/ou tino/s,
prosh=lqon: e)lpi\s d' e)/k ge plousi/wn do/mwn
labei=n ti nau/tais: e)k de\ mh\ e)xo/ntwn bi/on —
ou)d' ei) qe/loien, w)felei=n e)/xoien a)/n.
w)h/: ti/s a)\n pulwro\s e)k do/mwn mo/loi,
o(/stis diaggei/leie ta)/m' e)/sw kaka/;

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: ti/s pro\s pu/laisin; ou)k a)palla/ch| do/mwn

o)/xlon pare/ceis despo/tais; h)\ katqanh=|
*(/ellhn pefukw/s, oi(=sin ou)k e)pistrofai/.

sp.l: w)= grai=a, tau)ta\ tau=t' e)/ph ka)/llws le/gein

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: a)/pelq': e)moi\ ga\r tou=to pro/skeitai, ce/ne,
mhde/na pela/zein toisi/d' *(ellh/nwn do/mois.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: a)=: mh\ prosei/lei xei=ra mhd' w)/qei bi/a|.

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: pei/qh| ga\r ou)de\n w(=n le/gw, su\ d' ai)/tios.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: a)/ggeilon ei)/sw despo/taisi toi=si soi=s. . . .

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: pikrw=s a)/r' oi)=mai/ g' a)ggelei=n tou\s sou\s lo/gous.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: nauago\s h(/kw ce/nos, a)su/lhton ge/nos.

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: oi)=kon pro\s a)/llon nu/n tin' a)nti\ tou=d' i)/qi.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ou)/k, a)ll' e)/sw pa/reimi: kai\ su/ moi piqou=.

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: o)xlhro\s i)/sq' w)/n: kai\ ta/x' w)sqh/sh| bi/a|.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ai)ai=: ta\ kleina\ pou= 'sti/ moi strateu/mata;

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: ou)kou=n e)kei= pou semno\s h)=sq', ou)k e)nqa/de.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: w)= dai=mon, w(s a)na/ci' h)timw/meqa.

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: ti/ ble/fara te/ggeis da/krusi; pro\s ti/n' oi)ktro\s ei)=;

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: pro\s ta\s pa/roiqen sumfora\s eu)dai/monas.

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: ou)/koun a)pelqw\n da/krua soi=s dw/seis fi/lois;

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ti/s d' h(/de xw/ra; tou= de\ basi/leioi do/moi;

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: *prwteu\s ta/d' oi)kei= dw/mat', *ai)/guptos de\ gh=.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: *ai)/guptos; w)= du/sthnos, oi(= pe/pleuk' a)/ra.

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: ti/ dh\ to\ *nei/lou mempto/n e)sti/ soi ga/nos;

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ou) tou=t' e)me/mfqhn: ta\s e)ma\s ste/nw tu/xas.

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: polloi\ kakw=s pra/ssousin, ou) su\ dh\ mo/nos.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: e)/st' ou)=n e)n oi)/kois o(/ntin' o)noma/zeis a)/nac;

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: to/d' e)sti\n au)tou= mnh=ma, pai=s d' a)/rxei xqono/s.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: pou= dh=t' a)\n ei)/h; po/teron e)kto\s h)\ 'n do/mois;

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: ou)k e)/ndon: *(/ellhsin de\ polemiw/tatos.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ti/n' ai)ti/an sxw\n h(=s e)phuro/mhn e)gw/;

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: *(ele/nh kat' oi)/kous e)sti\ tou/sd' h( tou= *dio/s.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: pw=s fh/|s; ti/n' ei)=pas mu=qon; au)=qi/s moi fra/son.

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: h( *tundari\s pai=s, h(\ kata\ *spa/rthn pot' h)=n.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: po/qen molou=sa; ti/na to\ pra=gm' e)/xei lo/gon;

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: *lakedai/monos gh=s deu=ro nosth/sas' a)/po.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: po/te; ou)/ ti/ pou lelh/|smeq' e)c a)/ntrwn le/xos;

sp.speaker: *grau=s
sp.l: pri\n tou\s *)axaiou/s, w)= ce/n', e)s *troi/an molei=n.
a)ll' e(/rp' a)p' oi)/kwn: e)/sti ga/r tis e)n do/mois
tu/xh, tu/rannos h(=| tara/ssetai do/mos.
kairo\n ga\r ou)de/n' h)=lqes: h)\n de\ despo/ths
la/bh| se, qa/natos ce/nia/ soi genh/setai.
eu)/nous ga/r ei)m' *(/ellhsin, ou)x o(/son pikrou\s
lo/gous e)/dwka despo/thn foboume/nh.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ti/ fw=; ti/ le/cw; sumfora\s ga\r a)qli/as
e)k tw=n pa/roiqen ta\s parestw/sas klu/w,
ei) th\n me\n ai(reqei=san e)k *troi/as a)/gwn
h(/kw da/marta kai\ kat' a)/ntra sw/|zetai,
o)/noma de\ tau)to\n th=s e)mh=s e)/xousa/ tis
da/martos a)/llh toisi/d' e)nnai/ei do/mois.
*dio\s d' e)/lece pai=da/ nin pefuke/nai.
a)ll' h)= tis e)/sti *zhno\s o)/nom' e)/xwn a)nh\r
*nei/lou par' o)/xqas; ei(=s ga\r o(/ ge kat' ou)rano/n.
*spa/rth de\ pou= gh=s e)sti plh\n i(/na r(oai\
tou= kallido/nako/s ei)sin *eu)rw/ta mo/non;
a(plou=n de\ *tunda/reion o)/noma klh/|zetai.
*lakedai/monos de\ gai=a ti/s cunw/numos
*troi/as te; e)gw\ me\n ou)k e)/xw ti/ xrh\ le/gein.
polloi\ ga/r, w(s ei)/casin, e)n pollh=| xqoni\
o)no/mata tau)/t' e)/xousi kai\ po/lis po/lei
gunh\ gunaiki/ t': ou)de\n ou)=n qaumaste/on.
ou)d' au)= to\ deino\n prospo/lou feucou/meqa:
a)nh\r ga\r ou)dei\s w(=de ba/rbaros fre/nas,
o(\s o)/nom' a)kou/sas tou)mo\n ou) dw/sei bora/n.
kleino\n to\ *troi/as pu=r e)gw/ q' o(\s h(=ya/ nin,
*mene/laos, ou)k a)/gnwstos e)n pa/sh| xqoni/.
do/mwn a)/nakta prosmenw=: dissa\s de/ moi
e)/xei fula/ceis: h)\n me\n w)mo/frwn tis h)=|,
kru/yas e)mauto\n ei)=mi pro\s naua/gia:
h)\n d' e)ndidw=| ti malqako/n, ta\ pro/sfora
th=s nu=n parou/shs sumfora=s ai)th/somai.
kakw=n me\n h(mi=n e)/sxaton toi=s a)qli/ois,
a)/llous tura/nnous au)to\n o)/nta basile/a
bi/on prosaitei=n: a)ll' a)nagkai/ws e)/xei.
lo/gos ga/r e)stin ou)k e)mo/s, sofo\n d' e)/pos,
deinh=s a)na/gkhs ou)de\n i)sxu/ein ple/on.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h)/kousa ta=s qespiw|dou= ko/ras,
a(\ xrh/|zous' e)fa/nh tura/nnois
do/mois, w(s *mene/laos ou)/
pw melamfae\s oi)/xetai
di' e)/rebos xqoni\ krufqei/s,
a)ll' e)/ti kat' oi)=dm' a(/lion
truxo/menos ou)/pw lime/nwn
yau/seien patri/as ga=s,
a)latei/a| bio/tou
talai/frwn, a)/filos fi/lwn,
pantodapa=s † e)pi\ ga=s † po/da
xrimpto/menos ei)nali/w|
kw/pa| *trw|a/dos e)k ga=s.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: h(/d' au)= ta/fou tou=d' ei)s e(/dras e)gw\ pa/lin
stei/xw, maqou=sa *qeono/hs fi/lous lo/gous,
h(\ pa/nt' a)lhqw=s oi)=de: fhsi\ d' e)n fa/ei
po/sin to\n a(mo\n zw=nta fe/ggos ei)sora=n,

e)kei=se ka)kei=s' ou)d' a)gu/mnaston pla/nois,
h(/cein <d'> o(/tan dh\ phma/twn la/bh| te/los.
e(\n d' ou)k e)/lecen, ei) molw\n swqh/setai.
e)gw\ d' a)pe/sthn tou=t' e)rwth=sai safw=s,
h(sqei=s' e)pei/ nin ei)=pe/ moi sesw|sme/non.
e)ggu\s de/ ni/n pou th=sd' e)/fask' ei)=nai xqono/s,
nauago\n e)kpeso/nta su\n pau/rois fi/lois.
w)/moi, po/q' h(/ceis; w(s poqeino\s a)\n mo/lois.
e)/a, ti/s ou(=tos; ou)/ ti/ pou krupteu/omai
*prwte/ws a)se/ptou paido\s e)k bouleuma/twn;
ou)x w(s dromai/a pw=los h)\ *ba/kxh qeou=
ta/fw| cuna/yw kw=lon; a)/grios de/ tis
morfh\n o(/d' e)sti/n, o(/s me qhra=tai labei=n.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: be/bhken a)/loxos sh\ pro\s ai)qe/ros ptuxa\s

pa/ntes t' *)axaioi/, di' e)/m' e)pi\ *skamandri/ois

dokou=ntes *(ele/nhn ou)k e)/xont' e)/xein *pa/rin.
e)gw\ d', e)peidh\ xro/non e)/mein' o(/son me xrh=n,
to\ mo/rsimon sw/|sasa, pate/r' e)s ou)rano\n
a)/peimi: fh/mas d' h( ta/laina *tundari\s

w)= xai=re, *lh/das qu/gater, e)nqa/d' h)=sq' a)/ra;

h(ma=s to/d' au)=qis, w(s a)/dhn e)n *)ili/w|

e)/labon a)sme/na po/sin e)mo/n, fi/lai,

nefe/lhs a)/r' a)/llws ei)/xomen po/nous pe/ri;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: au(/th: lo/gois [d'] e)moi=si pi/steuson ta/de.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: w)= qu/gater, o( qeo\s w(s e)/fu ti poiki/lon
kai\ duste/kmarton. eu)= de/ pws pa/nta stre/fei
e)kei=se ka)kei=s' a)nafe/rwn: o(\ me\n ponei=,
o(\ d' ou) ponh/sas au)=qis o)/llutai kakw=s,
be/baion ou)de\n th=s a)ei\ tu/xhs e)/xwn.
su\ ga\r po/sis te so\s po/nwn mete/sxete,
su\ me\n lo/goisin, o(\ de\ doro\s proqumi/a|.
speu/dwn d' o(/t' e)/speud' ou)de\n ei)=xe: nu=n d' e)/xei
au)to/mata pra/cas ta)ga/q' eu)tuxe/stata.
ou)k a)/ra ge/ronta pate/ra kai\ *diosko/rw
h)/|sxunas, ou)d' e)/drasas oi(=a klh/|zetai.
nu=n a)naneou=mai to\n so\n u(me/naion pa/lin
kai\ lampa/dwn memnh/meq' a(\s tetrao/rois
i(/ppois troxa/zwn pare/feron: su\ d' e)n di/frois
cu\n tw=|de nu/mfh dw=m' e)/leipes o)/lbion.
kako\s ga\r o(/stis mh\ se/bei ta\ despotw=n
kai\ cugge/ghqe kai\ sunwdi/nei kakoi=s.
e)gw\ me\n ei)/hn, kei) pe/fux' o(/mws la/tris,
e)n toi=si gennai/oisin h)riqmhme/nos
dou/loisi, tou)/nom' ou)k e)/xwn e)leu/qeron,
to\n nou=n de/: krei=sson ga\r to/d' h)\ duoi=n kakoi=n
e(/n' o)/nta xrh=sqai, ta\s fre/nas t' e)/xein kaka\s
a)/llwn t' a)kou/ein dou=lon o)/nta tw=n pe/las.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: a)/g', w)= geraie/, polla\ me\n par' a)spi/da
moxqh/mat' e)ce/plhsas e)kponw=n e)moi/,
kai\ nu=n metasxw\n th=s e)mh=s eu)praci/as
a)/ggeilon e)lqw\n toi=s leleimme/nois fi/lois
ta/d' w(s e)/xonq' hu(/rhkas oi(= t' e)sme\n tu/xhs,
me/nein t' e)p' a)ktai=s tou/s t' e)mou\s karadokei=n
a)gw=nas oi(\ me/nousi/ m', w(s e)lpi/zomen,
kei) th/nde pws dunai/meq' e)kkle/yai xqono/s,
frourei=n o(/pws a)\n ei)s e(\n e)lqo/ntes tu/xhs
e)k barba/rwn swqw=men, h)\n dunw/meqa.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: e)/stai ta/d', w)=nac. a)lla/ toi ta\ ma/ntewn
e)sei=don w(s fau=l' e)sti\ kai\ yeudw=n ple/a.
ou)d' h)=n a)/r' u(gie\s ou)de\n e)mpu/rou flogo\s
ou)de\ pterwtw=n fqe/gmat': eu)/hqes de/ toi
to\ kai\ dokei=n o)/rniqas w)felei=n brotou/s.
*ka/lxas ga\r ou)k ei)=p' ou)d' e)sh/mhne stratw=|
nefe/lhs u(perqnh/|skontas ei)sorw=n fi/lous
ou)d' *(/elenos, a)lla\ po/lis a)nhrpa/sqh ma/thn.
ei)/pois a)/n: *ou(/nex' o( qeo\s ou)k h)bou/leto;
ti/ dh=ta manteuo/meqa; toi=s qeoi=si xrh\
qu/ontas ai)tei=n a)gaqa/, mantei/as d' e)a=n:
bi/ou ga\r a)/llws de/lear hu(re/qh to/de,
kou)dei\s e)plou/ths' e)mpu/roisin a)rgo\s w)/n:
gnw/mh d' a)ri/sth ma/ntis h(/ t' eu)bouli/a.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)s tau)to\ ka)moi\ do/ca manteiw=n pe/ri
xwrei= ge/ronti: tou\s qeou\s e)/xwn tis a)\n
fi/lous a)ri/sthn mantikh\n e)/xoi do/mois.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ei)=e(n: ta\ me\n dh\ deu=r' a)ei\ kalw=s e)/xei.
o(/pws d' e)sw/qhs, w)= ta/las, *troi/as a)/po,
ke/rdos me\n ou)de\n ei)de/nai, po/qos de/ tis
ta\ tw=n fi/lwn fi/loisin ai)sqe/sqai kaka/.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: h)= po/ll' a)nh/rou m' e(ni\ lo/gw| mia=| q' o(dw=|.
ti/ soi le/goim' a)\n ta\s e)n *ai)gai/w| fqora\s
ta\ *naupli/ou t' *eu)boika\ purpolh/mata
*krh/thn te *libu/hs q' a(\s e)pestra/fhn po/leis,
skopia/s te *perse/ws; ou) ga\r e)mplh/saimi/ s' <a)\n>
mu/qwn, le/gwn t' a)/n soi ka/k' a)lgoi/hn e)/ti,
pa/sxwn t' e)/kamnon: di\s de\ luphqei=men a)/n.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ka/llion ei)=pas h)/ s' a)nhro/mhn e)gw/.
e(\n d' ei)pe\ pa/nta paralipw/n, po/son xro/non
po/ntou 'pi\ nw/tois a(/lion e)fqei/rou pla/non;

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: e)n nausi\n w)\n pro\s toi=sin e)n *troi/a| de/ka
e)/tesi dih=lqon e(pta\ peridroma\s e)tw=n.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: feu= feu=: makro/n g' e)/lecas, w)= ta/las, xro/non
swqei\s d' e)kei=qen e)nqa/d' h)=lqes e)s sfaga/s.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: pw=s fh/|s; ti/ le/ceis; w(/s m' a)pw/lesas, gu/nai.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: feu=g' w(s ta/xista th=sd' a)pallaxqei\s xqono/s.
qanh=| pro\s a)ndro\s ou(= ta/d' e)sti\ dw/mata.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ti/ xrh=ma dra/sas a)/cion th=s sumfora=s;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: h(/keis a)/elptos e)mpodw\n e)moi=s ga/mois.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: h)= ga\r gamei=n tis ta)/m' e)boulh/qh le/xh;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: u(/brin q' u(bri/zein ei)s e)/m', h(\n e)/tlhn e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: i)di/a| sqe/nwn tis h)\ turanneu/wn xqono/s;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: o(\s gh=s a)na/ssei th=sde *prwte/ws go/nos.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: to/d' e)/st' e)kei=n' ai)/nigm' o(\ prospo/lou klu/w.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: poi/ois e)pista\s barba/rois pulw/masin;

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: toi=sd', e)/nqen w(/sper ptwxo\s e)chlauno/mhn.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ou)/ pou prosh/|teis bi/oton; w)= ta/lain' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: tou)/rgon me\n h)=n tou=t', o)/noma d' ou)k ei)=xen to/de.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: pa/nt' oi)=sq' a)/r', w(s e)/oikas, a)mf' e)mw=n ga/mwn.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: oi)=d': ei) de\ le/ktra die/fuges ta/d' ou)k e)/xw.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: a)/qikton eu)nh\n i)/sqi soi sesw|sme/nhn.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ti/s tou=de peiqw/; fi/la ga/r, ei) safh= le/geis.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: o(ra=|s ta/fou tou=d' a)qli/ous e(/dras e)ma/s;

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: o(rw= talai/nas stiba/das, w(=n ti/ soi\ me/ta;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: e)ntau=qa le/ktrwn i(keteu/omen fuga/s.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: bwmou= spani/zous' h)\ no/moisi barba/rois;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: e)rru/eq' h(ma=s tou=t' i)/son naoi=s qew=n.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ou)d' a)/ra pro\s oi)/kous naustolei=n <s'> e)/cesti/ moi;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ci/fos me/nei se ma=llon h)\ tou)mo\n le/xos.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ou(/tws a)\n ei)/hn a)qliw/tatos brotw=n.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: mh/ nun kataidou=, feu=ge d' e)k th=sde xqono/s.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: lipw/n se; *troi/an e)ce/persa sh\n xa/rin.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: krei=sson ga\r h)/ se ta)/m' a)poktei=nai le/xh.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: a)/nandra/ g' ei)=pas *)ili/ou t' ou)k a)/cia.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ou)k a)\n kta/nois tu/rannon, o(\ speu/deis i)/sws.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ou(/tw sidh/rw| trwto\n ou)k e)/xei de/mas;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ei)/sh|. to\ tolma=n d' a)du/nat' a)ndro\s ou) sofou=.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: sigh=| para/sxw dh=t' e)ma\s dh=sai xe/ras;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: e)s a)/poron h(/keis: dei= de\ mhxanh=s tinos.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: drw=ntas ga\r h)\ mh\ drw=ntas h(/dion qanei=n.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: mi/' e)/stin e)lpi/s, h(=| mo/nh| swqei=men a)/n.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: w)nhto\s h)\ tolmhto\s h)\ lo/gwn u(/po;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ei) mh\ tu/ranno/s <s'> e)kpu/qoit' a)figme/non.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: e)rei= de\ ti/s m'; ou) gnw/setai/ g' o(/s ei)m' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: e)/st' e)/ndon au)tw=| cu/mmaxos qeoi=s i)/sh.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: fh/mh tis oi)/kwn e)n muxoi=s i(drume/nh;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ou)/k, a)ll' a)delfh/: *qeono/hn kalou=si/ nin.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: xrhsth/rion me\n tou)/nom': o(/ ti de\ dra=| fra/son.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: pa/nt' oi)=d', e)rei= te suggo/nw| paro/nta se.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: qnh/|skoimen a)/n: laqei=n ga\r ou)x oi(=o/n te/ moi.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: i)/sws a)\n a)napei/saimen i(keteu/onte/ nin —

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ti/ xrh=ma dra=sai; ti/n' u(pa/geis m' e)s e)lpi/da;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: paro/nta gai/a| mh\ fra/sai se suggo/nw|.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: pei/sante d' e)k gh=s diori/saimen a)\n po/da;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: koinh=| g' e)kei/nh| r(a|di/ws, la/qra| d' a)\n ou)/.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: so\n e)/rgon, w(s gunaiki\ pro/sforon gunh/.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: w(s ou)k a)/xrwsta go/nat' e)mw=n e(/cei xerw=n.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: fe/r', h)\n de\ dh\ nw=|n mh\ a)pode/chtai lo/gous;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: qanh=|: gamou=mai d' h( ta/lain' e)gw\ bi/a|.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: prodo/tis a)\n ei)/hs: th\n bi/an skh/yas' e)/xeis.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: a)ll' a(gno\n o(/rkon so\n ka/ra katw/mosa . . .

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ti/ fh/|s; qanei=sqai; kou)/pot' a)lla/ceis le/xh;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: tau)tw=| ci/fei ge: kei/somai de\ sou= pe/las.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: e)pi\ toi=sde toi/nun decia=s e)mh=s qi/ge.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: yau/w, qano/ntos sou= to/d' e)klei/yein fa/os.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: ka)gw\ sterhqei\s sou= teleuth/sein bi/on.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: pw=s ou)=n qanou/meq' w(/ste kai\ do/can labei=n;

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: tu/mbou 'pi\ nw/tw| se\ ktanw\n e)me\ ktenw=.
prw=ton d' a)gw=na me/gan a)gwniou/meqa
le/ktrwn u(pe\r sw=n. o( de\ qe/lwn i)/tw pe/las:
to\ *trwiko\n ga\r ou) kataisxunw= kle/os
ou)d' *(ella/d' e)lqw\n lh/yomai polu\n yo/gon,
o(/stis *qe/tin me\n e)ste/rhs' *)axille/ws,
*telamwni/ou d' *ai)/antos ei)sei=don sfaga/s,

to
 *nhle/ws t' a)/paida: dia\ de\ th
 e)mh
ou)k a)ciw/sw katqanei=n da/mart' e)gw/;
ma/lista/ ge: ei) ga/r ei)sin oi( qeoi\ sofoi/,
eu)/yuxon a)/ndra polemi/wn qano/nq' u(/po
kou/fh| katampi/sxousin e)n tu/mbw| xqoni/,
kakou\s d' e)f' e(/rma stereo\n e)kba/llousi gh=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w)= qeoi/, gene/sqw dh/ pot' eu)tuxe\s ge/nos
to\ *tanta/leion kai\ metasth/tw kakw=n.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: oi)\ e)gw\ ta/laina: th=s tu/xhs ga\r w(=d' e)/xw.
*mene/lae, diapepra/gmeq': e)kbai/nei do/mwn
h( qespiw|do\s *qeono/h: ktupei= do/mos
klh/|qrwn luqe/ntwn. feu=g': a)ta\r ti/ feukte/on;
a)pou=sa ga/r se kai\ parou=s' a)figme/non
deu=r' oi)=den: w)= du/sthnos, w(s a)pwlo/mhn.
*troi/as de\ swqei\s ka)po\ barba/rou xqono\s
e)s ba/rbar' e)lqw\n fa/sgan' au)=qis e)mpesh=|.

sp.speaker: *qeono/h
sp.l: h(gou= su/ moi fe/rousa lampth/rwn se/las
qei/ou de semno\n qesmo\n ai)qe/ros muxou/s,
w(s pneu=ma kaqaro\n ou)ranou= decw/meqa:
su\ d' au)= ke/leuqon ei)/ tis e)/blayen podi\
stei/bwn a)nosi/w|, do\s kaqarsi/w| flogi/,
krou=son de\ peu/khn, i(/na diece/lqw, puro/s.
no/mon de\ to\n e)mo\n qeoi=sin a)podou=sai pa/ros
e)fe/stion flo/g' e)s do/mous komi/zete.
*(ele/nh, ti/ ta)ma\ — pw=s e)/xei — qespi/smata;
h(/kei po/sis soi *mene/lews o(/d' e)mfanh/s,
new=n sterhqei\s tou= te sou= mimh/matos.
w)= tlh=mon, oi(/ous diafugw\n h)=lqes po/nous,
ou)d' oi)=sqa no/ston oi)/kad' ei)/t' au)tou= menei=s:
e)/ris ga\r e)n qeoi=s su/llogo/s te sou= pe/ri
e)/stai pa/redros *zhni\ tw=|d' e)n h)/mati.
*(/hra me/n, h(/ soi dusmenh\s pa/roiqen h)=n,
nu=n e)stin eu)/nous ka)s pa/tran sw=|sai qe/lei
cu\n th=|d', i(/n' *(ella\s tou\s *)aleca/ndrou ga/mous,
dw/rhma *ku/pridos, yeudonumfeu/tous ma/qh|:
*ku/pris de\ no/ston so\n diafqei=rai qe/lei,
w(s mh\ 'celegxqh=| mhde\ priame/nh fanh=|
to\ ka/llos, *(ele/nhs ou(/nek', a)nonh/tois ga/mois.
te/los d' e)f' h(mi=n, ei)/q', a(\ bou/letai *ku/pris,
le/cas' a)delfw=| s' e)nqa/d' o)/nta diole/sw,
ei)/t' au)= meq' *(/hras sta=sa so\n sw/sw bi/on,
kru/yas' o(mai/mon', o(/s me prosta/ssei ta/de
ei)pei=n, o(/tan gh=n th/nde nosth/sas tu/xh|s. . . .
ti/s ei)=s' a)delfw=| to/nde shmanw=n e)mw=|
paro/nq', o(/pws a)\n tou)mo\n a)sfalw=s e)/xh|;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: w)= parqe/n', i(ke/tis a)mfi\ so\n pi/tnw go/nu
kai\ proskaqi/zw qa=kon ou)k eu)dai/mona
u(pe/r t' e)mauth=s tou=de/ q', o(\n mo/lis pote\
labou=s' e)p' a)kmh=s ei)mi katqano/nt' i)dei=n:
mh/ moi katei/ph|s sw=| kasignh/tw| po/sin
to/nd' ei)s e)ma\s h(/konta filta/tas xe/ras,
sw=|son de/, li/ssomai/ se: suggo/nw| de\ sw=|
th\n eu)se/beian mh\ prodw=|s th\n sh/n pote,
xa/ritas ponhra\s ka)di/kous w)noume/nh.
misei= ga\r o( qeo\s th\n bi/an, ta\ kthta\ de\
kta=sqai keleu/ei pa/ntas ou)k e)s a(rpaga/s.
[e)ate/os d' o( plou=tos a)/diko/s tis w)/n.]
koino\s ga/r e)stin ou)rano\s pa=sin brotoi=s
kai\ gai=', e)n h(=| xrh\ dw/mat' a)naplhroume/nous
ta)llo/tria mh\ sxei=n mhd' a)fairei=sqai bi/a|.
h(ma=s de\ kairi/ws me/n, a)qli/ws d' e)moi/,
*(ermh=s e)/dwke patri\ sw=| sw/|zein po/sei
tw=|d' o(\s pa/resti ka)pola/zusqai qe/lei.
pw=s ou)=n qanw\n a)\n a)pola/boi; kei=nos de\ pw=s
ta\ zw=nta toi=s qanou=sin a)podoi/h pot' a)/n;
h)/dh ta\ tou= qeou= kai\ ta\ tou= patro\s sko/pei:
po/teron o( dai/mwn xw( qanw\n ta\ tw=n pe/las
bou/loint' a)\n h)\ ou) bou/loint' a)\n a)podou=nai pa/lin;
dokw= me/n. ou)/koun xrh/ se suggo/nw| ple/on
ne/mein matai/w| ma=llon h)\ xrhstw=| patri/.
ei) d' ou)=sa ma/ntis kai\ ta\ qei=' h(goume/nh
to\ me\n di/kaion tou= patro\s diafqerei=s,
tw=| d' ou) dikai/w| suggo/nw| sw/seis xa/rin,
ai)sxro\n ta\ me/n se qei=a pa/nt' e)ceide/nai,
ta/ t' o)/nta kai\ me/llonta, ta\ de\ di/kaia mh/.
th/n t' a)qli/an e)/m', oi(=sin e)/gkeimai kakoi=s,
r(u=sai, pa/rergon dou=sa tou=to th=s tu/xhs:
*(ele/nhn ga\r ou)dei\s o(/stis ou) stugei= brotw=n:
h(\ klh/|zomai kaq' *(ella/d' w(s prodou=s' e)mo\n
po/sin *frugw=n w)/|khsa poluxru/sous do/mous.
h)\n d' *(ella/d' e)/lqw ka)pibw= *spa/rths <pa/lin>,
klu/ontes ei)sido/ntes w(s te/xnais qew=n
w)/lont', e)gw\ de\ prodo/tis ou)k a)/r' h)= fi/lwn,
pa/lin m' a)na/cous' e)s to\ sw=fron au)=qis au)=,
e(dnw/somai/ te qugate/r', h(\n ou)dei\s gamei=,
th\n d' e)nqa/d' e)klipou=s' a)lhtei/an pikra\n
o)/ntwn e)n oi)/kois xrhma/twn o)nh/somai.
kei) me\n qanw\n o(/d' e)n pura=| katesfa/gh,
pro/sw sf' a)po/nta dakru/ois a)\n h)ga/pwn:
nu=n d' o)/nta kai\ swqe/nt' a)faireqh/somai;
mh\ dh=ta, parqe/n', a)lla/ s' i(keteu/w to/de:
do\s th\n xa/rin moi th/nde kai\ mimou= tro/pous
patro\s dikai/ou: paisi\ ga\r kle/os to/de
ka/lliston, o(/stis e)k patro\s xrhstou= gegw\s
e)s tau)to\n h)=lqe toi=s tekou=si tou\s tro/pous.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: oi)ktro\n me\n oi( paro/ntes e)n me/sw| lo/goi,
oi)ktra\ de\ kai\ su/. tou\s de\ *mene/lew poqw=
lo/gous a)kou=sai ti/nas e)rei= yuxh=s pe/ri.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: e)gw\ so\n ou)/t' a)\n prospesei=n tlai/hn go/nu

ou)/t' a)
 dakru=sai ble/fara: th
 *troi/an ga a)
deiloi\ geno/menoi plei=ston ai)sxu/noimen a)/n.
kai/toi le/gousin w(s pro\s a)ndro\s eu)genou=s
e)n cumforai=si da/kru' a)p' o)fqalmw=n balei=n.
a)ll' ou)xi\ tou=to to\ kalo/n, ei) kalo\n to/de,
ai(rh/somai 'gw\ pro/sqe th=s eu)yuxi/as.
a)ll', ei) me\n a)/ndra soi dokei= sw=|sai ce/non
zhtou=nta/ g' o)rqw=s a)polabei=n da/mart' e)mh/n,
a)po/dos te kai\ pro\s sw=|son: ei) de\ mh\ dokei=,
e)gw\ me\n ou) nu=n prw=ton a)lla\ polla/kis
a)/qlios a)\n ei)/hn, su\ de\ gunh\ kakh\ fanh=|.
a(\ d' a)/ci' h(mw=n kai\ di/kai' h(gou/meqa
kai\ sh=s ma/lista kardi/as a)nqa/yetai,
le/cw ta/d' a)mfi\ mnh=ma sou= patro\s po/qw|:
*)=w ge/ron, o(\s oi)kei=s to/nde la/inon ta/fon,
a)po/dos, a)paitw= th\n e)mh\n da/marta/ se,
h(\n *zeu\s e)/pemye deu=ro/ soi sw/|zein e)moi/.
oi)=d' ou(/nek' h(mi=n ou)/pot' a)podw/seis qanw/n:
a)ll' h(/de pate/ra ne/rqen a)nakalou/menon
ou)k a)ciw/sei to\n pri\n eu)klee/staton
kakw=s a)kou=sai: kuri/a ga/r e)sti nu=n.
w)= ne/rter' *(/aidh, kai\ se\ su/mmaxon kalw=,
o(\s po/ll' e)de/cw th=sd' e(/kati sw/mata
peso/nta tw)mw=| fasga/nw|, misqo\n d' e)/xeis:
h)\ nu=n e)kei/nous a)po/dos e)myu/xous pa/lin,
h)\ th/nde patro\s eu)sebou=s a)na/gkason
krei/ssw fanei=san ta)ma/ g' a)podou=nai le/xh.
ei) d' e)me\ gunai=ka th\n e)mh\n sulh/sete,
a(/ soi pare/lipen h(/de tw=n lo/gwn, fra/sw.
o(/rkois keklh/|meq', w(s ma/qh|s, w)= parqe/ne,
prw=ton me\n e)lqei=n dia\ ma/xhs sw=| suggo/nw|
ka)kei=non h)\ 'me\ dei= qanei=n: a(plou=s lo/gos.

h)
 d' e)s me
 a)lkh
 mh\ po/d' a)ntiqh=| podi/,
limw=| de\ qhra=| tu/mbon i(keteu/onte nw/,
ktanei=n de/doktai th/nde moi ka)/peit' e)mo\n
pro\s h(=par w)=sai di/stomon ci/fos to/de
tu/mbou 'pi\ nw/tois tou=d', i(/n' ai(/matos r(oai\
ta/fou katasta/zwsi: keiso/mesqa de\
nekrw\ du/' e(ch=s tw=|d' e)pi\ cestw=| ta/fw|,
a)qa/naton a)/lgos soi/, yo/gos de\ sw=| patri/.
ou) ga\r gamei= th/nd' ou)/te su/ggonos se/qen
ou)/t' a)/llos ou)dei/s: a)ll' e)gw/ sf' a)pa/comai,
ei) mh\ pro\s oi)/kous duna/meq', a)lla\ pro\s nekrou/s.
ti/ tau=ta; dakru/ois e)s to\ qh=lu trepo/menos
e)leino\s h)=n a)\n ma=llon h)\ drasth/rios.
ktei=n', ei) dokei= soi: dusklea=s ga\r ou) ktenei=s:
ma=llo/n ge me/ntoi toi=s e)moi=s pei/qou lo/gois,
i(/n' h)=|s dikai/a kai\ da/mart' e)gw\ la/bw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)n soi\ brabeu/ein, w)= nea=ni, tou\s lo/gous:
ou(/tw de\ kri=non, w(s a(/pasin a(nda/nh|s.

sp.speaker: *qeono/h
sp.l: e)gw\ pe/fuka/ t' eu)sebei=n kai\ bou/lomai,
filw= t' e)mauth/n, kai\ kle/os tou)mou= patro\s
ou)k a)\n mia/naim', ou)de\ suggo/nw| xa/rin
doi/hn a)\n e)c h(=s duskleh\s fanh/somai.
e)/nesti d' i(ero\n th=s di/khs e)moi\ me/ga
e)n th=| fu/sei: kai\ tou=to *nhre/ws pa/ra
e)/xousa sw/|zein, *mene/lews, peira/somai.
*(/hra| d', e)pei/per bou/letai/ s' eu)ergetei=n,
e)s tau)to\n oi)/sw yh=fon: h( *ku/pris d' e)moi\
i(/lews me\n ei)/h, cumbe/bhke d' ou)damou=:
peira/somai de\ parqe/nos me/nein a)ei/.
a(\ d' a)mfi\ tu/mbw| tw=|d' o)neidi/zeis patri/,
h(mi=n o(/d' au(to\s mu=qos. a)dikoi/hmen a)/n,
ei) mh\ a)podw/sw: kai\ ga\r a)\n kei=nos ble/pwn
a)pe/dwken a)\n soi\ th/nd' e)/xein, tau/th| de\ se/.
kai\ ga\r ti/sis tw=nd' e)sti\ toi=s te nerte/rois
kai\ toi=s a)/nwqen pa=sin a)nqrw/pois: o( nou=s
tw=n katqano/ntwn zh=| me\n ou)/, gnw/mhn d' e)/xei
a)qa/naton ei)s a)qa/naton ai)qe/r' e)mpesw/n.
w(s ou)=n parainw= mh\ makra/n, sigh/somai
a(/ mou kaqiketeu/sat', ou)de\ mwri/a|
cu/mboulos e)/somai th=| kasignh/tou pote/.
eu)ergetw= ga\r kei=non ou) dokou=s' o(/mws,
e)k dussebei/as o(/sion ei) ti/qhmi/ nin.
au)toi\ me\n ou)=n o(do/n tin' e)ceuri/skete,
e)gw\ d' a)posta=s' e)kpodw\n sigh/somai.
e)k tw=n qew=n d' a)/rxesqe xi(keteu/ete
th\n me/n s' e)a=sai patri/da nosth=sai *ku/prin,
*(/hras de\ th\n e)/nnoian e)n tau)tw=| me/nein
h(\n e)s se\ kai\ so\n po/sin e)/xei swthri/as.
su\ d', w)= qanw/n moi pa/ter, o(/son g' e)gw\ sqe/nw,
ou)/pote keklh/sh| dussebh\s a)nt' eu)sebou=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)dei/s pot' eu)tu/xhsen e)/kdikos gegw/s,
e)n tw=| dikai/w| d' e)lpi/des swthri/as.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: *mene/lae, pro\s me\n parqe/nou sesw/|smeqa:
tou)nqe/nde dh\ se\ tou\s lo/gous fe/ronta xrh\
koinh\n cuna/ptein mhxanh\n swthri/as.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: a)/koue dh/ nun: xro/nios ei)= kata\ ste/gas
kai\ sunte/qrayai prospo/loisi basile/ws.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ti/ tou=t' e)/lecas; e)sfe/reis ga\r e)lpi/das
w(s dh/ ti dra/swn xrhsto\n e)s koino/n ge nw=|n.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: pei/seias a)/n tin' oi(/tines tetrazu/gwn
o)/xwn a)na/ssous', w(/ste nw=|n dou=nai di/frous;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: pei/saim' <a)/n>: a)lla\ ti/na fugh\n feucou/meqa
pedi/wn a)/peiroi barba/rou t' o)/ntes xqono/s;

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: a)du/naton ei)=pas. fe/re, ti/ d', ei) krufqei\s do/mois
kta/noim' a)/nakta tw=|de disto/mw| ci/fei;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ou)k a)/n s' a)na/sxoit' ou)de\ sigh/seien a)\n
me/llont' a)delfh\ su/ggonon kataktenei=n.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: a)ll' ou)de\ mh\n nau=s e)/stin h(=| swqei=men a)\n
feu/gontes: h(\n ga\r ei)/xomen qa/lass' e)/xei.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: a)/kouson, h)/n ti kai\ gunh\ le/ch| sofo/n.
bou/lh| le/gesqai, mh\ qanw/n, lo/gw| qanei=n;

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: kako\s me\n o)/rnis: ei) de\ kerdanw=, le/gein
e(/toimo/s ei)mi mh\ qanw\n lo/gw| qanei=n.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: kai\ mh\n gunaikei/ois s' a)\n oi)ktisai/meqa
kourai=si kai\ qrh/noisi pro\s to\n a)no/sion.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: swthri/as de\ tou=t' e)/xei ti/ nw=|n a)/kos;
palaio/ths ga\r tw=| lo/gw| g' e)/nesti/ tis.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: w(s dh\ qano/nta s' e)na/lion kenw=| ta/fw|
qa/yai tu/rannon th=sde gh=s ai)th/somai.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: kai\ dh\ parei=ken: ei)=ta pw=s a)/neu new\s
swqhso/mesqa kenotafou=nt' e)mo\n de/mas;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: dou=nai keleu/sw porqmi/d', h(=| kaqh/somai
ko/smon ta/fw| sw=| pelagi/ous e)s a)gka/las.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: w(s eu)= to/d' ei)=pas plh\n e(/n: ei) xe/rsw| tafa\s
qei=nai keleu/sei s', ou)de\n h( skh=yis fe/rei.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: a)ll' ou) nomi/zein fh/somen kaq' *(ella/da
xe/rsw| kalu/ptein tou\s qano/ntas e)nali/ous.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: tou=t' au)= katorqoi=s: ei)=t' e)gw\ sumpleu/somai
kai\ sugkaqh/sw ko/smon e)n tau)tw=| ska/fei.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: se\ kai\ parei=nai dei= ma/lista tou/s te sou\s
plwth=ras oi(/per e)/fugon e)k nauagi/as.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: kai\ mh\n e)a/nper nau=n e)p' a)gku/ras la/bw,
a)nh\r par' a)/ndra sth/setai cifhfo/ros.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: se\ xrh\ brabeu/ein pa/nta: po/mpimoi mo/non
lai/fei pnoai\ ge/nointo kai\ new\s dro/mos.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: e)/stai: po/nous ga\r dai/mones pau/sousi/ mou.
a)ta\r qano/nta tou= m' e)rei=s pepusme/nh;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: sou=: kai\ mo/nos ge fa/ske diafugei=n mo/ron
*)atre/ws ple/wn su\n paidi\ kai\ qano/nq' o(ra=n.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: kai\ mh\n ta/d' a)mfi/blhstra sw/matos r(a/kh
cummarturh/sei nautikw=n e)reipi/wn.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: e)s kairo\n h)=lqe, to/te d' a)/kair' a)pw/lluto:
to\ d' a)/qlion kei=n' eu)tuxe\s ta/x' a)\n pe/soi.

sp.speaker: *menele/ws
sp.l: po/tera d' e)s oi)/kous soi\ suneiselqei=n me xrh\
h)\ pro\s ta/fw| tw=|d' h(/suxoi kaqw/meqa;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: au)tou= me/n': h)\n ga\r kai/ ti plhmmele/s se dra=|,
ta/fos s' o(/d' a)\n r(u/saito fa/sgano/n te so/n.
e)gw\ d' e)s oi)/kous ba=sa bostru/xous temw=
pe/plwn te leukw=n me/lanas a)ntalla/comai
parh=|di/ t' o)/nuxa fo/nion e)mbalw= xroo/s.
me/gas ga\r a(gw/n, kai\ ble/pw du/o r(opa/s:
h)\ ga\r qanei=n dei= m', h)\n a(lw= texnwme/nh,
h)\ patri/da t' e)lqei=n kai\ so\n e)ksw=|sai de/mas.
w)= po/tni' h(\ *di/oisin e)n le/ktrois pi/tneis
*(/hra, du/' oi)ktrw\ fw=t' a)na/yucon po/nwn,
ai)tou/meq' o)rqa\s w)le/nas pro\s ou)rano\n
r(i/ptonq', i(/n' oi)kei=s a)ste/rwn poiki/lmata.
su/ q', h(\ 'pi\ tw)mw=| ka/llos e)kth/sw ga/mw|,
ko/rh *diw/nhs *ku/pri, mh/ m' e)cerga/sh|.
a(/lis de\ lu/mhs h(/n m' e)lumh/nw pa/ros
tou)/noma parasxou=s', ou) to\ sw=m', e)n barba/rois.
qanei=n d' e)/aso/n m', ei) kataktei=nai qe/leis,
e)n gh=| patrw/|a|. ti/ pot' a)/plhstos ei)= kakw=n,
e)/rwtas a)pa/tas do/lia/ t' e)ceurh/mata
a)skou=sa fi/ltra q' ai(mathra\ dwma/twn;
ei) d' h)=sqa metri/a, ta)/lla g' h(di/sth qew=n
pe/fukas a)nqrw/poisin: ou)k a)/llws le/gw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: se\ ta\n e)nau/lois u(po\ dendroko/mois
mousei=a kai\ qa/kous e)ni/-
zousan a)naboa/sw,
se\ ta\n a)oidota/tan o)/rniqa melw|do\n
a)hdo/na dakruo/essan,
e)/lq' w)= dia\ couqa=n
genu/wn e)lelizome/na
qrh/nwn e)moi\ cunergo/s,
*(ele/nas mele/as po/nous
to\n *)ilia/dwn t' a)ei
dou/sa| dakruo/enta po/tmon
*)axaiw=n u(po\ lo/gxais:
o(/t' e)/drame r(o/qia pedi/a barba/rw| pla/ta|
o(/t' e)/molen e)/mole, me/lea *priami/dais a)/gwn
*lakedai/monos a)/po le/xea
se/qen, w)= *(ele/na, *pa/ris ai)no/gamos
pompai=sin *)afrodi/tas.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: polloi\ d' *)axaiw=n dori\ kai\ petri/nais
r(ipai=sin e)kpneu/santes *(/ai-
dan me/leon e)/xousin,
talaina=n a)lo/xwn kei/rantes e)/qeiran:
a)/numfa de\ me/laqra kei=tai:
pollou\s de\ purseu/sas
flogero\n se/las a)mfiru/tan
*eu)/boian ei(=l' *)axaiw=n
mono/kwpos a)nh/r, pe/trais
*kafhri/sin e)mbalw\n
*ai)gai/ais t' e)na/lois do/lion
a)ktai=s a)ste/ra la/myas.
a)li/mena d' o)/rea *ma/lea xeima/twn pnoa=|,
o(/t' e)/suto patri/dos a)popro/, barba/rou stola=s
ge/ras, ou) ge/ras a)ll' e)/rin,
*danaw=n *mene/las e)pi\ nausi\n a)/gwn,
ei)/dwlon i(ero\n *(/hras.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o(/ ti qeo\s h)\ mh\ qeo\s h)\ to\ me/son,
ti/s fhs' e)reunh/sas brotw=n
makro/taton pe/ras eu(rei=n
o(\s ta\ qew=n e)sora=|
deu=ro kai\ au)=qis e)kei=se
kai\ pa/lin a)ntilo/gois
phdw=nt' a)nelpi/stois tu/xais;
su\ *dio\s e)/fus, w)= *(ele/na, quga/thr:
ptano\s ga\r e)n ko/lpois se *lh/-
das e)te/knwse path/r.
ka)=|t' i)axh/qhs kaq' *(ellani/an
prodo/tis a)/pistos a)/dikos a)/qeos: ou)d' e)/xw
ti/ to\ safe\s e)/ti pot' e)n brotoi=s:
to\ tw=n qew=n <d'> e)/pos a)laqe\s hu(=ron.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/frones o(/soi ta\s a)reta\s pole/mw|
lo/gxaisi/ t' a)lkai/ou doro\s
kta=sqe, po/nous a)maqw=s qna-
tw=n katapauo/menoi:
ei) ga\r a(/milla krinei= nin
ai(/matos, ou)/pot' e)/ris
lei/yei kat' a)nqrw/pwn po/leis:
a(=| *priami/dos ga=s e)/laxon qala/mous,
e)co\n diorqw=sai lo/gois
sa\n e)/rin, w)= *(ele/na.
nu=n d' oi(\ me\n *(/aida| me/lontai ka/tw,
tei/xea de\ flogmo\s w(/ste *dio/s e)pe/suto flo/c,
e)pi\ de\ pa/qea pa/qesi fe/reis
† a)qli/ois sumforai=s ai)li/nois. †

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: w)= xai=re, patro\s mnh=m': e)p' e)co/doisi ga\r
e)/qaya, *prwteu=, s' e(/nek' e)mh=s prosrh/sews:
a)ei\ de/ s' e)ciw/n te ka)siw\n do/mous
*qeoklu/menos pai=s o(/de prosenne/pei, pa/ter.
u(mei=s me\n ou)=n ku/nas te kai\ qhrw=n bro/xous,
dmw=es, komi/zet' e)s do/mous turannikou/s:
e)gw\ d' e)mauto\n po/ll' e)loido/rhsa dh/:
ou) ga/r ti qana/tw| tou\s kakou\s kola/zomen;
kai\ nu=n pe/pusmai fanero\n *(ellh/nwn tina\
e)s gh=n a)fi=xqai kai\ lelhqe/nai skopou/s,
h)/toi kato/pthn h)\ klopai=s qhrw/menon
*(ele/nhn: qanei=tai d', h)/n ge dh\ lhfqh=| mo/non.
e)/a:
a)ll', w(s e)/oike, pa/nta diapepragme/na
hu(/rhka: tu/mbou ga\r kena\s lipou=s' e(/dras
h( *tundari\s pai=s e)kpepo/rqmeutai xqono/s.
w)h/, xala=te klh=|qra: lu/eq' i(ppika\
fa/tnhs, o)padoi/, ka)kkomi/zeq' a(/rmata,
w(s a)\n po/nou g' e(/kati mh\ la/qh| me gh=s
th=sd' e)kkomisqei=s' a)/loxos, h(=s e)fi/emai. —
e)pi/sxet': ei)sorw= ga\r ou(\s diw/komen
paro/ntas e)n do/moisi kou) pefeugo/tas.
au(/th, ti/ pe/plous me/lanas e)ch/yw xroo\s
leukw=n a)mei/yas' e)/k te krato\s eu)genou=s
ko/mas si/dhron e)mbalou=s' a)pe/qrisas
xlwroi=s te te/ggeis da/krusi sh\n parhi/da
klai/ousa; po/teron e)nnu/xois pepeisme/nh
ste/neis o)nei/rois, h)\ fa/tin tin' oi)/koqen
klu/ousa lu/ph| sa\s die/fqarsai fre/nas;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: w)= de/spot' — h)/dh ga\r to/d' o)noma/zw s' e)/pos —
o)/lwla: frou=da ta)ma\ kou)de/n ei)m' e)/ti.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: e)n tw=| de\ kei=sai sumfora=s; ti/s h( tu/xh;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: *mene/laos — oi)/moi, pw=s fra/sw; — te/qnhke/ moi.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: ou)de/n ti xai/rw soi=s lo/gois, ta\ d' eu)tuxw=.
pw=s <d'> oi)=sqa; mw=n soi *qeono/h le/gei ta/de;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: kei/nh te fhsi\n o(/ te parw\n o(/t' w)/lluto.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: h(/kei ga\r o(/stis kai\ ta/d' a)gge/llei safh=;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: h(/kei: mo/loi ga\r oi(= sf' e)gw\ xrh/|zw molei=n.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: ti/s e)sti; pou= 'stin; i(/na safe/steron ma/qw.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: o(/d' o(\s ka/qhtai tw=|d' u(popth/cas ta/fw|.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: *)/apollon, w(s e)sqh=ti dusmo/rfw| pre/pei.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: oi)/moi, dokw= me\n ka)mo\n w(=d' e)/xein po/sin.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: podapo\s d' o(/d' a(nh\r kai\ po/qen kate/sxe gh=n;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: *(/ellhn, *)axaiw=n ei(=s e)mw=| su/mplous po/sei.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: qana/tw| de\ poi/w| fhsi\ *mene/lewn qanei=n;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: oi)ktro/taq', u(groi=sin e)n kludwni/ois a(lo/s.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: pou= barba/roisi pela/gesin nausqlou/menon;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: *libu/hs a)lime/nois e)kpeso/nta pro\s pe/trais.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: kai\ pw=s o(/d' ou)k o)/lwle koinwnw=n pla/ths;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: e)sqlw=n kaki/ous e)ni/ot' eu)tuxe/steroi.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: lipw\n de\ nao\s pou= pa/restin e)/kbola;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: o(/pou kakw=s o)/loito, *mene/lews de\ mh/.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: o)/lwl' e)kei=nos. h)=lqe d' e)n poi/w| ska/fei;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: nau=tai/ sf' a)nei/lont' e)ntuxo/ntes, w(s le/gei.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: pou= dh\ to\ pemfqe\n a)nti\ sou= *troi/a| kako/n;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: nefe/lhs le/geis a)/galma; e)s ai)qe/r' oi)/xetai.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: w)= *pri/ame kai\ gh= *trw|a/s, <w(s> e)/rreis ma/thn.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ka)gw\ mete/sxon *priami/dais duspraci/as.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: po/sin d' a)/qapton e)/lipen h)\ kru/ptei xqoni/;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: a)/qapton: oi)\ e)gw\ tw=n e)mw=n tlh/mwn kakw=n.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: tw=nd' ou(/nek' e)/tames bostru/xous canqh=s ko/mhs:

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: fi/los ga/r e)stin, o(/s pot' e)sti/n, e)nqa/d' w)/n.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: o)rqw=s me\n h(/de sumfora\ dakru/etai —

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: e)n eu)marei= gou=n sh\n kasignh/thn laqei=n.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: ou) dh=ta. pw=s ou)=n; to/nd' e)/t' oi)kh/seis ta/fon;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ti/ kertomei=s me, to\n qano/nta d' ou)k e)a=|s;

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: pisth\ ga\r ei)= su\ sw=| po/sei feu/gousa/ me.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: a)ll' ou)ke/t': h)/dh d' a)/rxe tw=n e)mw=n ga/mwn.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: xro/nia me\n h)=lqen, a)ll' o(/mws ai)nw= ta/de.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: oi)=sq' ou)=n o(\ dra=son; tw=n pa/ros laqw/meqa.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: e)pi\ tw=|; xa/ris ga\r a)nti\ xa/ritos e)lqe/tw.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: sponda\s te/mwmen kai\ dialla/xqhti/ moi.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: meqi/hmi nei=kos to\ so/n, i)/tw d' u(po/pteron.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: pro/s nu/n se gona/twn tw=nd', e)pei/per ei)= fi/los —

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: ti/ xrh=ma qhrw=s' i(ke/tis w)re/xqhs e)mou=;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: to\n katqano/nta po/sin e)mo\n qa/yai qe/lw.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: ti/ d'; e)/st' a)po/ntwn tu/mbos; h)\ qa/yeis skia/n;

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: *(/ellhsi/n e)sti no/mos, o(\s a)\n po/ntw| qa/nh| —

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: ti/ dra=n; sofoi/ toi *pelopi/dai ta\ toia/de.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: kenoi=si qa/ptein e)n pe/plwn u(fa/smasin.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: kte/riz': a)ni/sth tu/mbon ou(= xrh/|zeis xqono/s.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: ou)x w(=de nau/tas o)lome/nous tumbeu/omen.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: pw=s dai/; le/leimmai tw=n e)n *(/ellhsin no/mwn.

sp.speaker: *(ele/nh
sp.l: e)s po/nton o(/sa xrh\ ne/kusin e)cormi/zomen.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos

prosei=pe do/lion oi)=kton e)s me/son fe/rwn:
*)=w tlh/mones, pw=s e)k ti/nos new/s pote
*)axaii/dos qrau/santes h(/kete ska/fos;
a)=r' *)atre/ws pai=d' o)lo/menon sunqa/ptete,
o(\n *tundari\s pai=s h(/d' a)po/nta kenotafei=;
oi(\ d' e)kbalo/ntes da/krua poihtw=| tro/pw|,
e)s nau=n e)xw/roun *mene/lew| ponti/smata
fe/rontes. h(mi=n d' h)=n me\n h(/d' u(poyi/a
lo/gos t' e)n a)llh/loisi, tw=n e)pesbatw=n
w(s plh=qos ei)/h: diesiwpw=men d' o(/mws
tou\s sou\s lo/gous sw/|zontes: a)/rxein ga\r new\s
ce/non keleu/sas pa/nta sune/xeas ta/de.
kai\ ta)/lla me\n dh\ r(a|di/ws e)/sw new\s
e)qe/meqa koufi/zonta: tau/reios de\ pou\s
ou)k h)/qel' o)rqo\s sani/da prosbh=nai ka/ta,
a)ll' e)cebruxa=t' o)/mm' a)nastre/fwn ku/klw|
kurtw=n te nw=ta ka)s ke/ras paremble/pwn
mh\ qigga/nein a)pei=rgen. o( d' *(ele/nhs po/sis
e)ka/lesen: *)=w pe/rsantes *)ili/ou po/lin,
ou)k ei)=' a)narpa/santes *(ellh/nwn no/mw|
neani/ais w)/moisi tau/reion de/mas
e)s prw=|ran e)mbalei=te, †fa/sgano/n q' a(/ma
pro/xeiron w)/sei† sfa/gia tw=| teqnhko/ti;
oi(\ d' e)s ke/leusm' e)lqo/ntes e)canh/rpasan
tau=ron fe/ronte/s t' ei)se/qento se/lmata.
mona/mpukon de\ *mene/lews yh/xwn de/rhn
me/twpa/ t' e)ce/peisen e)sbh=nai do/ru.
te/los d', e)peidh\ nau=s ta\ pa/nt' e)de/cato,
plh/sasa klimakth=ras eu)sfu/rw| podi/
*(ele/nh kaqe/zet' e)n me/sois e(dwli/ois,
o(/ t' ou)ke/t' w)\n lo/goisi *mene/lews pe/las:
a)/lloi de\ toi/xous deciou\s laiou/s t' i)/soi
a)nh\r par' a)/ndr' e(/zonq', u(f' ei(/masi ci/fh
laqrai=' e)/xontes, r(o/qia/ t' e)cepi/mplato
boh=s keleustou= fqe/gmaq' w(s h)kou/samen.
e)pei\ de\ gai/as h)=men ou)/t' a)/gan pro/sw
ou)/t' e)ggu/s, ou(/tws h)/ret' oi)a/kwn fu/lac:
*)/et', w)= ce/n', e)s to\ pro/sqen — h)\ kalw=s e)/xei —
pleu/swmen; a)rxai\ ga\r new\s me/lousi soi/.
o(\ d' ei)=f': *(/alis moi. decia=| d' e(lw\n ci/fos
e)s prw=|ran ei(=rpe ka)pi\ taurei/w| sfagh=|
staqei\s nekrw=n me\n ou)deno\s mnh/mhn e)/xwn,
te/mnwn de\ laimo\n hu)/xet': *)=w nai/wn a(/la
po/ntie *po/seidon *nhre/ws q' a(gnai\ ko/rai,
sw/sate/ m' e)p' a)kta\s *naupli/as da/marta/ te
a)/sulon e)k gh=s. ai(/matos d' a)porroai\
e)s oi)=dm' e)shko/ntizon ou)/rioi ce/nw|.
kai/ tis to/d' ei)=pe: *do/lios h( nauklhri/a.
pa/lin ple/wmen: decia\n ke/leue su/,
su\ de\ stre/f' oi)/ak'. e)k de\ taurei/ou fo/nou
*)atre/ws staqei\s pai=s a)nebo/hse summa/xous:
*ti/ me/llet', w)= gh=s *(ella/dos lwti/smata,
sfa/zein foneu/ein barba/rous new/s t' a)/po
r(i/ptein e)s oi)=dma; nauba/tais de\ toi=si soi=s
boa=| keleusth\s th\n e)nanti/an o)/pa:
*ou)k ei)=' o(\ me/n tis loi=sqon a)rei=tai do/ru,
o(\ de\ zu/g' a)/cas, o(\ d' a)felw\n skalmou= pla/thn
kaqaimatw/sei kra=ta polemi/wn ce/nwn;
o)rqoi\ d' a)nh=|can pa/ntes, oi(\ me\n e)n xeroi=n
kormou\s e)/xontes nautikou/s, oi(\ de\ ci/fh:
fo/nw| de\ nau=s e)rrei=to. parake/leusma d' h)=n
pru/mnhqen *(ele/nhs: *pou= to\ *trwiko\n kle/os;
dei/cate pro\s a)/ndras barba/rous: spoudh=s d' u(/po
e)/pipton, oi(\ d' w)rqou=nto, tou\s de\ keime/nous
nekrou\s a)\n ei)=des. *mene/lews d' e)/xwn o(/pla,
o(/poi nosoi=en cu/mmaxoi kataskopw=n,
tau/th| prosh=ge xeiri\ decia=| ci/fos,
w(/st' e)kkolumba=n nao/s, h)rh/mwse de\
sw=n naubatw=n e)retma/. e)p' oi)a/kwn de\ ba\s
a)/nakt' e)s *(ella/d' ei)=pen eu)qu/nein do/ru.
oi(\ d' i(sto\n h)=|ron, ou)/riai d' h(=kon pnoai/.
beba=si d' e)k gh=s. diafugw\n d' e)gw\ fo/non
kaqh=k' e)mauto\n ei)s a(/l' a)/gkuran pa/ra:
h)/dh de\ ka/mnonq' o(rmiato/nwn me/ tis
a)nei/let', e)s de\ gai=an e)ce/bhse/ soi
ta/d' a)ggelou=nta. sw/fronos d' a)pisti/as
ou)k e)/stin ou)de\n xrhsimw/teron brotoi=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)k a)/n pot' hu)/xoun ou)/te s' ou)/q' h(ma=s laqei=n
*mene/laon, w)=nac, w(s e)la/nqanen parw/n.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: w)= gunaikei/ais te/xnaisin ai(reqei\s e)gw\ ta/las:
e)kpefeu/gasin ga/moi me. kei) me\n h)=n a(lw/simos
nau=s diw/gmasin, ponh/sas ei(=lon a)\n ta/xa ce/nous:
nu=n de\ th\n prodou=san h(ma=s teiso/mesqa su/ggonon,
h(/tis e)n do/mois o(rw=sa *mene/lewn ou)k ei)=pe/ moi.
toiga\r ou)/pot' a)/llon a)/ndra yeu/setai manteu/masin.

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: ou(=tos w)/, poi= so\n po/d' ai)/reis, de/spot', e)s poi=on fo/non;

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: oi(=per h( di/kh keleu/ei me: a)ll' a)fi/stas' e)kpodw/n.

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: ou)k a)fh/somai pe/plwn sw=n: mega/la <ga\r> speu/deis kaka/.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: a)lla\ despotw=n krath/seis dou=los w)/n;

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: fronw= ga\r eu)=.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: ou)k e)/moig', ei) mh/ m' e)a/seis —

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: ou) me\n ou)=n s' e)a/somen.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: su/ggonon ktanei=n kaki/sthn —

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: eu)sebesta/thn me\n ou)=n.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: h(/ me prou/dwken —

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: kalh/n ge prodosi/an, di/kaia dra=n.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: ta)ma\ le/ktr' a)/llw| didou=sa.

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: toi=s ge kuriwte/rois.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: ku/rios de\ tw=n e)mw=n ti/s;

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: o(\s e)/laben patro\s pa/ra.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: a)ll' e)/dwken h( tu/xh moi.

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: to\ de\ xrew\n a)fei/leto.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: ou) se\ ta)ma\ xrh\ dika/zein.

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: h)/n ge belti/w le/gw.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: a)rxo/mesq' a)/r', ou) kratou=men.

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: o(/sia dra=n, ta\ d' e)/kdik' ou)/.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: katqanei=n e)ra=n e)/oikas.

sp.speaker: *qera/pwn
sp.l: ktei=ne: su/ggonon de\ sh\n
ou) ktenei=s h(mw=n e(ko/ntwn, a)ll' e)/me: <w(s> pro\ despotw=n
toi=si gennai/oisi dou/lois eu)klee/staton qanei=n.

sp.speaker: *dio/skoroi
sp.l: e)pi/sxes o)rga\s ai(=sin ou)k o)rqw=s fe/rh|,
*qeoklu/mene, gai/as th=sd' a)/nac: dissoi\ de/ se
*dio/skoroi kalou=men, ou(\s *lh/da pote\
e)/tikten *(ele/nhn q', h(\ pe/feuge sou\s do/mous:
ou) ga\r peprwme/noisin o)rgi/zh| ga/mois,
ou)d' h( qea=s *nhrh=|dos e)/kgonos ko/rh
a)dikei= s' a)delfh\ *qeono/h, ta\ tw=n qew=n
timw=sa patro/s t' e)ndi/kous e)pistola/s.
e)s me\n ga\r ai)ei\ to\n paro/nta nu=n xro/non
kei/nhn katoikei=n soi=sin e)n do/mois e)xrh=n:
e)pei\ de\ *troi/as e)canesta/qh ba/qra,
kai\ toi=s qeoi=s pare/sxe tou)/nom', ou)ke/ti:
e)n toi=si d' au(th=s dei= nin e)zeu=xqai ga/mois
e)lqei=n t' e)s oi)/kous kai\ sunoikh=sai po/sei.
a)ll' i)/sxe me\n sh=s suggo/nou me/lan ci/fos,
no/mize d' au)th\n swfro/nws pra/ssein ta/de.

pa/lai d' a)delfh
 ka)
 pri
 e)cesw/samen,
e)pei/per h(ma=s *zeu\s e)poi/hsen qeou/s:
a)ll' h(/sson' h)=men tou= peprwme/nou q' a(/ma
kai\ tw=n qew=n, oi(=s tau=t' e)/docen w(=d' e)/xein.
soi\ me\n ta/d' au)dw=, suggo/nw| d' e)mh=| le/gw:
plei= cu\n po/sei sw=|: pneu=ma d' e(/cet' ou)/rion:
swth=re d' h(mei=s sw\ kasignh/tw diplw=
po/nton parippeu/onte pe/myomen pa/tran.
o(/tan de\ ka/myh|s kai\ teleuth/sh|s bi/on,
qeo\s keklh/sh| kai\ *diosko/rwn me/ta
spondw=n meqe/ceis ce/nia/ t' a)nqrw/pwn pa/ra
e(/ceis meq' h(mw=n: *zeu\s ga\r w(=de bou/letai.
ou(= d' w(/rise/n soi prw=ta *maia/dos to/kos,
*spa/rths a)pa/ras, to\n kat' ou)rano\n dro/mon,
kle/yas de/mas so\n mh\ *pa/ris gh/meie/ se,
— frouro\n par' *)akth\n tetame/nhn nh=son le/gw —
*(ele/nh to\ loipo\n e)n brotoi=s keklh/setai,
e)pei\ klopai/an s' e)k do/mwn e)de/cato.
kai\ tw=| planh/th| *mene/lew| qew=n pa/ra
maka/rwn katoikei=n nh=so/n e)sti mo/rsimon:
tou\s eu)genei=s ga\r ou) stugou=si dai/mones,
tw=n d' a)nariqmh/twn ma=llo/n ei)sin oi( po/noi.

sp.speaker: *qeoklu/menos
sp.l: w)= pai=de *lh/das kai\ *dio/s, ta\ me\n pa/ros
nei/kh meqh/sw sfw=n kasignh/ths pe/ri:
e)gw\ d' a)delfh\n ou)ke/t' a)\n kta/noim' e)mh/n.
kei/nh d' i)/tw pro\s oi)=kon, ei) qeoi=s dokei=.
i)/ston d' a)ri/sths swfronesta/ths q' a(/ma
gegw=t' a)delfh=s o(mogenou=s a)f' ai(/matos.
kai\ xai/req' *(ele/nhs ou(/nek' eu)genesta/ths
gnw/mhs, o(\ pollai=s e)n gunaici\n ou)k e)/ni.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pollai\ morfai\ tw=n daimoni/wn,
polla\ d' a)e/lptws krai/nousi qeoi/:
kai\ ta\ dokhqe/nt' ou)k e)tele/sqh,
tw=n d' a)dokh/twn po/ron hu(=re qeo/s.
toio/nd' a)pe/bh to/de pra=gma.
